value:
$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|Huh?! Quick, Eirika, hide!$k$p$nMPID_比翼エイリーク|Ah! Wh-what is it?$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|I saw a shadow headed this way.
Come on, this way. We'll hide here
and get the drop on them.$k$p...Now!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Before21,Face|Gyah! Wh-who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|Oh! Hm... We were brought here
against our will. Did the same
happen to you, by chance?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Before21,Face|Yes, I—$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|No time to discuss that now, you two.
Someone's approaching. Now, while
we have the advantage!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|Come on! Retreat, Eirika—and you!
Hurry! This way!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Before21,Face|I-I'm with you!$k$p$Sbs150|
